org.jboss.msc.service

Interface ServiceBuilder<T>


  • public interface ServiceBuilder<T>
    A service builder. Implementations of this interface are not thread safe. Sample usage: 
     ServiceRegistry registry = ...
 ServiceBuilder builder = txn.addService(registry, ServiceName.of("foo", "bar", "service");
 builder.setMode(ServiceMode.ACTIVE);
 final Dependency serverHost = builder.addDependency(ServiceName.of("server", "host"));
 final Dependency serverPort = builder.addDependency(ServiceName.of("server", "port"));
 final FooBarService myService = new FooBarService(serverHost, serverPortPort);
 builder.setService(myService);
 builder.install();
    Author:
    Flavia Rainone, Richard Opalka service type

      • getServiceContext

        ServiceContext getServiceContext()
        Returns a service context for creating and removing services. All services created by this context will be automatically children of the service being installed.
        Returns:
        service context

      • install

        ServiceController install()
                          throws IllegalStateException,
                                 DuplicateServiceException,
                                 CircularDependencyException
        Initiates installation of this configured service to the container.
        Returns:
        the controller for the installed service
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called more than once
        DuplicateServiceException - if installation collides with some already existing service
        CircularDependencyException - if dependencies cycle is detected
